entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Hello! My name is Diana.

Iâ€™ve been asked to develop a blog to discuss my activities and experiences during my internship with Yocto through the Outreachy program. This is that blog.

Iâ€™m excited about the program, but visibility makes me very nervous! So, this blog will focus on the tech that I use and work with over the next few months.

The blog itself is built with Hexo and uses the Weightless theme. I host it through GitHub Pages here. I like Hexo because Iâ€™m comfortable with JavaScript, and I publish through GitHub because itâ€™s free. You can check out the blogâ€™s source code here.

I believe in you. Wish me luck through this, ok? ðŸ’–
